title: How to Make Rudolf Poo (Chocolate Apricot Drops)

steps.headline: Crush about 8 rich tea biscuits in a bowl.
steps.description: Crush with your fingers or a heavy utensil such as a meat mallet. You can use a plastic bag on a counter top if preferred; just place biscuits in the bag and crush using a rolling pin.

steps.headline: Chop up approximately 8 dried apricots into tiny pieces.

text: Crush about 8 rich tea biscuits in a bowl. Crush with your fingers or a heavy utensil such as a meat mallet. You can use a plastic bag on a counter top if preferred; just place biscuits in the bag and crush using a rolling pin. Chop up approximately 8 dried apricots into tiny pieces. This is best done on a wooden cutting board. Wash hands to remove stickiness before proceeding. Melt about 250g of chocolate chips over a pan of water. You can use either dark, milk, or white chocolate. Stir in the four dessert spoons of golden syrup. Stir the biscuit crumbs and apricots into the chocolate.  Form the mixture into small balls with your fingers. Put the balls on a baking tray or plate covered in baking paper. Place in the fridge to harden for about an hour. Dust with icing sugar (or cocoa powder if you are using white chocolate). Serve and enjoy! Finished.
